title: Lithium License Data
description: The data package for a Lithium license, including its metadata and custom payload.

id.description: The unique ID for this license, used by clients to request a license renewal.

activates.description: The ISO8061 date on which this license becomes active.

expires.description: The ISO8061 date on which this license expires.

pack.description: The licenses contained within this license pack, allowing the owner of this license to generate licenses for its decendants.

additionalProperties.description: The types of license which are available for generation for child nodes.

count.description: The number of licenses which may be generated for this license type.
